message: so it shows who create what?
We use Convore for our business (all private rooms and topics), so when the boss's icon appears next to a thread, you know that it's a must-read. :D
so we know who to blame for topics like these. :p
It would be great if the group admin could turn the feature off.
In another topic somewhere, I know the idea was mentioned of allowing the topic creator to set an image. That sounds like it could be useful.
all right, topic avatars might be useful. but what about the group avatars? At least, it would be better to make them random
As a suggestion: You should just be able to upload a new one....
